EmailTemplate.subject: CF Summit Recap - Sent by Pivotal on behalf of Canopy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 2014
<http://www.canopy-cloud.com>
Follow up to Cloud Foundry Summit
As a Gold sponsor of the Cloud Foundry Summit in San Francisco a couple of weeks ago, Canopy would like to thank you for attending and hope that you found the event valuable and enjoyable.
We'd like to recap two significant announcements <http://www.canopy-cloud.com/press-release/june-11-enterprise-paas-cloud-platform-for-digital-business> that we made at Cloud Foundry Summit, and invite <http://www.bit.ly/cloudfabric> you to a webinar on July 8th to learn more.
Canopy joins Cloud Foundry Foundation
Canopy and Pivotal announced that Canopy is joining the Cloud Foundry Foundation as a Silver member
We're excited about helping to create an open ecosystem to foster the growth and development of enterprise Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) that's agile, flexible and easy to use.
Introducing Canopy Cloud Fabric powered by Pivotal CF
Canopy announced we're extending our cloud platform for adaptive digital enterprise with the new Canopy Cloud Fabric solution which delivers Pivotal CF as a managed cloud service with additional value-add from Canopy
With Canopy Cloud Fabric you get the best of Pivotal CF coupled with:
- Choice of tenancy options to meet various levels of dedication: multi-tenant, virtual private or fully private - Choice of locations around the world to meet data locality/sovereignty requirements - Choice of hosting arrangements, including the option to host your own dedicated private PaaS in your own datacentre - Range of application and data services provided and managed by Canopy, including the option to host services locally to your application to remove network latency issues - Consulting, customisation and developer services to customise the solution to meet the specific needs of your organization - All of the above managed and supported by Canopy with rock solid enterprise class service levels.
To learn more, attend <http://www.bit.ly/cloudfabric> our webinar on July 8th and to take Canopy Cloud Fabric for a test drive apply <mailto:cloudfabric_admin@canopy-cloud.com?subject=Application to join Canopy Cloud Fabric Early Adopter Program> to join our Early Adopter Program.
What next?
Attend Adaptive Digital Enterprise Webinar
Join our webinar on July 8th to learn how Canopy can help you to cloud-enable existing applications, as well as accelerate development of new cloud-native applications. <#1> <http://www.bit.ly/cloudfabric>
Apply for Cloud Fabric Early Adopter Program
Canopy is offering an early adopter program through which qualifying organizations can test drive the Canopy Cloud Fabric service with no charge for a limited time. <#1>
<mailto:cloudfabric_admin@canopy-cloud.com?subject=Application to join Canopy Cloud Fabric Early Adopter Program>
